title: What are possible causes of client freezing/crashing?
body: I just lost my promos because my client crashed during champion selects. It's the second time it crashes today and i found this pretty frustrating. What are possible causes for a client to crash & what are possible solutions?

replies.body:
Damn, losing your promos really sucks! I'm sorry to hear that.

The cause of the crashes really depends on the specific symptoms before the crash and whether you're using the Beta Client or Legacy Client. With a few more details, I can assist in troubleshooting this.
I and another friend re having in game freezes that are so rough they crashed our computers a few times.
